alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Sitka (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 9:33PM AKST until December 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT THURSDAY NIGHT TO 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...City and Borough of Sitka. * WHEN...From midnight Thursday night to 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Snow will begin to mix with rain in the early hours on Saturday making the snow hard to remove. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall rates will be during the daylight hours on Friday. Locally higher snow amounts are possible in locations away from water.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
